title: Welcoming Party
text: Join us as we welcome incoming SFU and FIC students!

title: SFUIA Halloween Party
text: Prepare your tricks or treats, and to the terrifying yet funniest time of the year: our upcoming Halloween Party! Horribly awesome prizes and so much fun awaits you.
place: Brookmere Party Room at Brookmere Apartment

title: SFUIA Olympics 2023
text: Shoot for the hoop or strike the ball! Join us in SFUIA's annual thrilling basketball and futsal competition

title: LEMPER
text: Let's Meet in Person! Join us at SFUIA's LEMPER Welcoming Party

title: Sports Week!
text: SOCCER - will be the upcoming sports week!
place: The place changes each week, so be sure to check our Calendar!

title: Gerobak - Sambal Matah
text: Our food sale ensures you don't miss the taste of home! PO before May 11!

title: HalloScream
text: Celebrate Halloween with SFUIA's annual SpookFest!

text: Gather your friends, sharpen your skills, and dive into the ultimate gaming experience!

text: Warm up before the upcoming olympics with your gaming skils!

title: SFUIA Olympics 2024
text: Gather your friends, as SFUIA's annual Olympics is here! Compete in basketball, voleyball, futsal, or badminton!
